mean_cn: adj. 近视的，眼光短浅的
mean_en: able to see things clearly only if they are very close to you; not thinking carefully about the possible effects of something or what might happen in the future
sentence: You're shortsighted, so if you want to look into my eyes, you'll need these glasses.
sentence_trans: 你是近视眼，如果你想仔细看我的眼睛，你得戴上这幅眼镜。
word_etyma: short短 + sight目光 + ed形容词后缀 → shortsighted眼光短浅的
